title: An Act relative to a renewable portfolio standard review

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Giannino of Revere, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3497) of Jessica Ann Giannino relative to a renewable portfolio standard review.  Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

related_entities.name: committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/16/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 10/16/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:55 PM in A-1                                                                                                                   and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Reporting date extended to Wednesday, March 18, 2026
